info.title: Faucet API - Transaction History
info.description: API documentation for retrieving faucet transaction history.

get.description: Retrieves the transaction history for a specified organization ID.

protocol.description: The protocol used for the transaction.

network.description: The network used for the transaction.

amount.description: The amount sent in the transaction.

address.description: The address to which the amount was sent.

userId.description: User ID associated with the transaction.

organizationId.description: Organization ID associated with the transaction.

transactionHash.description: Transaction hash, nullable if not available.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the transaction in milliseconds.
